webscript.description:
Post SAML config for given network/tenant
http://<host>:<port>/alfresco/a/{network}/saml/config
Example body to this web script:
{ "ssoEnabled" : true, "idpSsoURL" : "https://localhost:9031/idp/SSO.saml2", "idpSloRequestURL" : "https://localhost:9031/idp/SLO.saml2", "idpSloResponseURL" : "https://localhost:9031/idp/SLO.saml2", "certificate" : "MIICXTCCAcagAwIBAgIGATDjcWMtRe..." }
Notes: - user must be a Network Admin for given network/tenant
